title: Strengthening Software Development Practice Competencies: TPACK-Based Digital Technology for Oxidation-Reduction Reaction Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can visually observe and explain electron transfer processes in redox reactions through fruit battery experiments.
Analysis linking macroscopic phenomena and microscopic particle behaviors based on data collected using digital sensors (current/pH).
Comprehensive comparison and interpretation of various representations of redox reactions (chemical equations, graphs, particle models) to explain relationships between concepts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
